title: Sri Lanka Army continues community welfare in Alaveddy area, Jaffna
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma The Sri Lanka Army continues their community welfare and social projects for the villagers in the Jaffna peninsula where people need a helping hand to uplift their livelihoods. This time they extended their social work again in Alaveddy area under the directions of Security Forces Commander- Jaffna, Major General…
